Package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclint

Klasse DocLint

java.lang.Object
com.sun.tools.doclint.DocLint
org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclint.DocLint
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Plugin
public class DocLint extends com.sun.tools.doclint.DocLint
Multi-function entry point for the doc check utility.

This class can be invoked in the following ways:

  • From the command line
  • From javac, as a plugin
  • Directly, via a simple API

    • main

      public static void main(String... args)

    • run

      public void run(String... args) throws DocLint.BadArgs, IOException
      Simple API entry point.
      Parameter:
      args - Options and operands for doclint
      Löst aus:
      DocLint.BadArgs - if an error is detected in any args
      IOException - if there are problems with any of the file arguments

    • run

      public void run(PrintWriter out, String... args) throws DocLint.BadArgs, IOException
      Löst aus:
      DocLint.BadArgs
      IOException

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • init

      public void init(JavacTask task, String... args)

    • init

      public void init(JavacTask task, String[] args, boolean addTaskListener)
      Initialize DocLint for use with a JavacTask.

      Strict reference checks are not enabled by default.

      Parameter:
      task - the task
      args - arguments to configure DocLint
      addTaskListener - whether or not to register a TaskListener to invoke DocLint

    • init

      public void init(DocTrees trees, Elements elements, Types types, String... args)
      Initialize DocLint with the given utility objects and arguments.

      Strict reference checks are enabled by default.

      Parameter:
      trees - the DocTrees utility class
      elements - the Elements utility class
      types - the Types utility class
      args - arguments to configure DocLint
